emails.subject: Re: New client in Datahub Env
emails.body_text:
Yes - we need to limit.
________________________________

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 3:39 PM
To: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: New client in Datahub Env 
 

Hello Sami,

 

Env is Adjusted , but I think we need to limit the access of other datahub users from other environments eg : Tudor , Anuj sing right ?

 

 

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 13:19
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: New client in Datahub Env

 

Hi Saber,

Yes - Tradematrix + S&D dashboards on Dnexr.

API: tradematrix (including snapshots -> history) + datasets behind dashboards. 

 

Thanks

 

________________________________

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 12:34 PM
To: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io <mailto:sami.jaballah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: New client in Datahub Env 

 

Hello Sami,

 

Just to be sure , the resources we are sharing are Tradematrices & S&D Dashboards (the DNEXR one I assume ?) ? if he is going to be using the API he can not download the data from the dashboards , perhaps the datasets behind those dashboards ? 

 

Thanks in advance for your help.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io <mailto:sami.jaballah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 9:55
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io <mailto:jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io> >
Subject: New client in Datahub Env

 

Hello,

 

We have a new client -  for a test period of 3 months - Jump Systems (USA). He needs access to:

*	Historical S&D Forecasts (Tradeflows + S&D dashboards): all commodities

 

Needs 1 user: VDG@jumptrading.com <mailto:VDG@jumptrading.com>  (Data Engineering team) -> will access through APIs

Please  do not send before validation

 

Period: 15.01.2026 to 15.04.2026

 

Many thanks

Sami
emails.body_html:
Yes - we need to limit.
From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 3:39 PM
To: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: New client in Datahub Env
 

Hello Sami,

 

Env is Adjusted , but I think we need to limit the access of other datahub users from other environments eg : Tudor , Anuj sing right ?

 

 

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 13:19
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: Re: New client in Datahub Env

 

Hi Saber,

Yes - Tradematrix + S&D dashboards on Dnexr.

API: tradematrix (including snapshots -> history) + datasets behind dashboards. 

 

Thanks

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 12:34 PM
To: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: New client in Datahub Env

 

Hello Sami,

 

Just to be sure , the resources we are sharing are Tradematrices & S&D Dashboards (the DNEXR one I assume ?) ? if he is going to be using the API he can not download the data from the dashboards , perhaps the datasets behind those dashboards ?

 

Thanks in advance for your help.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Sami Jaballah <sami.jaballah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 9:55
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Jebrane Ben Salem <jebrane.bensalem@dnext.io>
Subject: New client in Datahub Env

 

Hello,

 

We have a new client -  for a test period of 3 months - Jump Systems (USA). He needs access to:

  • Historical S&D Forecasts (Tradeflows + S&D dashboards): all commodities

 

Needs 1 user: VDG@jumptrading.com (Data Engineering team) -> will access through APIs

Please  do not send before validation

 

Period: 15.01.2026 to 15.04.2026

 

Many thanks

Sami
